name: @tvf/types
description: Auto-generated TypeScript types for TVF Restaurant API

scripts.clean: rimraf dist generated types.d.ts openapi.json generated-client
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run fetch-schema && pnpm run generate && pnpm run copy-types
scripts.build-full: pnpm run clean && pnpm run fetch-schema && pnpm run generate && pnpm run generate-client && pnpm run copy-types
scripts.dev: pnpm run integrate && pnpm run watch
scripts.dev-full: pnpm run integrate-full && pnpm run watch
